heading: Exploring Bali's Enchanting Beach Paradises

itinerary.day1Overview: Upon arrival, get transferred to the hotel and check-in. You can explore the city on your own by visiting places like Waterbom Waterpark, Ubud Art Market, Bali Bird Park, and many more. Later, return to the hotel at your own pace for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview: Board your transfer to Kintamani Village to start the Central Bali sightseeing tour. Then, continue your journey to see Coffee Plantations, Tegenungan Waterfalls, and Tegalalang Rice Terrace. Also, visit the Bali Swing for amazing photos. Later, get transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Monkey Forest and Tanah Lot Visit | Arrival in Kuta
itinerary.day3Overview: Check-out and get transferred to the Alas Kedaton Monkey Forest where you will see many long-tailed Macaques. Then, continue your journey to visit Bali's iconic Tanah Lot temple for a beautiful sunset view. Afterwards, get transferred to the hotel in Kuta for check-in. Have an overnight stay.

itinerary.day4Overview: Board your transfer from the hotel to the Tanjung Benoa beach and enjoy thrilling water sports. Later, get transferred to Bali's architectural beauty, Uluwatu Temple, which offers the best views of the Indian ocean. Later, get assisted back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Overview: Board the transfer from the hotel to Sanur Harbor. From here, take a speedboat to reach Nusa Penida Island. Admire the beauty of Kelingking Beach, Angel’s Billabong, and Broken Bay. Also, enjoy snorkeling while at the beach. Later, get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day6Overview: After breakfast, get transferred to the airport and board your flight back home. This is where your trip ends.

overView.heading: Bali's Cultural Tapestry: Tradition Meets Modernity
overView.text: Embark on a journey through Bali's rich cultural heritage, where ancient traditions harmonize with contemporary life. Explore the island's diverse landscapes, vibrant culture, and historic landmarks that paint a vivid picture of its enchanting essence.

overView.heading: Captivating Ubud: Art, Temples, and Rice Terraces
overView.text: Discover the allure of Ubud, Bali's cultural heartland. Immerse yourself in the artistry of traditional crafts, visit ancient temples, and wander through emerald-green rice terraces that epitomize the island's serene beauty and spiritual charm.

overView.heading: Island Escapes: Bali's Pristine Beaches and Coral Reefs
overView.text: Indulge in the tranquility of Bali's pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs. Relax on sun-kissed shores, dive into crystal-clear waters teeming with marine life, and unwind in luxurious beachfront resorts that offer a slice of paradise.

overView.heading: Cultural Festivities: Bali's Vibrant Celebrations and Rituals
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the colorful festivities and sacred rituals of Bali. From vibrant temple ceremonies to captivating dance performances, experience the island's cultural richness and spiritual vibrancy that captivate the hearts of visitors.

overView.heading: Enchanting Highlands: Volcanic Peaks and Terraced Landscapes
overView.text: Explore Bali's enchanting highlands, where towering volcanic peaks and emerald-green terraced landscapes create a mesmerizing backdrop. Trek through lush jungles, witness cascading waterfalls, and soak in panoramic views that evoke a sense of wonder.

overView.heading: Gastronomic Delights: Balinese Cuisine and Street Eats
overView.text: Savor the tantalizing flavors of Balinese cuisine and street eats. From aromatic spices to succulent satays and refreshing tropical fruits, embark on a culinary journey that delights the senses and showcases the island's culinary diversity.

overView.heading: Artisan Traditions: Handcrafted Treasures and Batik Creations
overView.text: Discover Bali's artisan traditions through its handcrafted treasures and intricate batik creations. Explore local markets, interact with skilled artisans, and admire the craftsmanship that reflects the island's rich cultural heritage and artistic soul.

overView.heading: Craft Your Bali Adventure
overView.text: Craft your own adventure in Bali, where every moment is infused with magic and discovery. Whether you seek tranquil beaches, cultural immersion, or adrenaline-fueled escapades, Bali invites you to embrace its beauty and create memories that last a lifetime.

visaPolicy: Tourist Visa for under 30 days free on arrival
Tourist Visa for over 30 days ₹2400 for an extension, you will have to pay ₹4213 or ₹1817 if done through an agent
B211 Visa can be bought on arrival with each extension costing ₹2400
The visa fees may be subject to change and travellers should check the latest fees before planning their trip to Bali.
